channel.title: Hello, Please Help?
channel.description: Hi, I am making a quest right now but what i need to know is: When you click on an NPC I figured out how to make the NPC talk like the dialogue shows up with him talking but how do i make a dialogue your your person talk back to him. please reply, thanks

You just need to add options to the dialogue i guess
